DOC.brief_summary: The goal study determine whether short treatment lipoic acid , antioxidant use treatment diabetic neuropathy , improve blood vessel reactivity decrease oxidant stress person elevate blood cholesterol .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Lipid criterion inclusion plasma LDL 160 190 mg/dl ( total cholesterol usually 240285 mg/dl ) Less 2 coronary risk factor , already cholesterollowering diet . Exclusion criterion : Overt clinical atherosclerosis Diabetes Currently take cholesterollowering medication . Subjects lipid disorder Subjects take supplemental lipoic acid , vitamin C , vitamin E .
